title: Compassion - Ci Yue Vegetarian
description: Vegetarian food court restaurant uses no eggs, onions or garlic and has vegan options. Offers rice, noodles and snacks all day. Daily specials include Hainanese chicken rice, duck rice/noodle, nasi lemak, laksa, prawn noodles; all served in a daily rotation basis. A la carte menu includes: hokkien reid mee, mee goreng, fried rice, Japanese unagi rice, black pepper steak rice.
